page.title: 15OCCUPATIONS
page.content:
This is a survey of the occupations of some 3rd. & 4th. year juniors:-
{ FATHERS {Occupations No. Occupations No. Shop workers 9 Post Office 2 Managers 7 Army major 1 Factory works.7 Barman 1 Electricians 5 Book maker 1 Craftsmen 3 Designer 1 Health/Med. 2 Crisp manuf. 1 Insurance 2 Night porter 1 Lorry drivers 2 Solicitor 1 Surveyors 2 Vicar 1
{MOTHERS} {Occupations No. Occupations No.} Housewives 20 Secretaries 4 Teachers & Post Office 2 playgroups 8 Cleaners 2 Shop workers 7 Dinner lady 1 Health/Dental 4 Theatre worker1
